languages.text: Пустотнорожденными называют людей, рожденных на борту пустотных кораблей или на древних орбитальных спутниках. Жизнь, проведенная на пустотных кораблях, накладывает травмирующий отпечаток. Всему виной искажение реальности при путешествиях через {g|Encyclopedia:VeilDegradationGlossary}варп{/g} и пребывание в условиях низкой или нулевой гравитации. Нередко эти люди обладают отталкивающей внешностью. У них могут быть деформированные черты лица, мертвенно-бледная кожа, неестественная походка, дефекты речи и другие незначительные патологии.
languages.original_text: Voidborn are humans birthed in the belly of a void vessel or aboard an ancient orbital satellite. Those who have lived their lives on voidships become inured to some extent due to the reality-altering process of warp travel and to living in low- or zero-gravity environments. In many cases, their features are drawn and their skin pallid. They may even have minor deformities, or a strangeness to their speech, gait, or general appearance that sets them apart from others.

traits.locale_text: Пустотнорожденными называют людей, рожденных на борту пустотный кораблей или на древних орбитальных спутниках. traits.locale_text: Void born are humans birthed in the belly of a void vessel or aboard an ancient orbital satellite. Those who have lived their lives on voidships become inured to some extent due to the reality-altering process of warp travel and to living in low- or zero-gravity environments. In many cases, their features are drawn and their skin pallid. They may even have minor deformities, or a strangeness to their speech, gait, or general appearance that sets them apart from others.

Voidborn are humans birthed in the belly of a void vessel or aboard an ancient orbital satellite. Those who have lived their lives on voidships become inured to some extent due to the reality-altering process of warp travel and to living in low- or zero-gravity environments. In many cases, their features are drawn and their skin pallid. They may even have minor deformities, or a strangeness to their speech, gait, or general appearance that sets them apart from others.

Voidborn are humans birthed in the belly of a void vessel or aboard an ancient orbital satellite. Those who have lived their lives on voidships become inured to some extent due to the reality-altering process of warp travel and to living in low- or zero-gravity environments. In many cases, their features are drawn and their skin pallid. They may even have minor deformities, or a strangeness to their speech, gait, or general appearance that sets them apart from others.

languages.text: Leerengeborene sind Menschen, die im Bauch eines Raumschiffs oder an Bord eines uralten Orbital-Satelliten geboren wurden. Diejenigen, die ihr Leben auf Raumschiffen verbracht haben, sind durch den realitätsverändernden Prozess der Warpreise und das Leben in niedriger oder gar keiner Schwerkraft bis zu einem gewissen Grad abgestumpft. In vielen Fällen sind ihre Gesichtszüge gezeichnet und ihre Haut ist blass. Sie können sogar kleine Missbildungen haben oder eine seltsame Sprache, einen seltsamen Gang oder ein ungewöhnliches Aussehen haben, das sie von anderen unterscheidet.
languages.original_text: Voidborn are humans birthed in the belly of a void vessel or aboard an ancient orbital satellite. Those who have lived their lives on voidships become inured to some extent due to the reality-altering process of warp travel and to living in low- or zero-gravity environments. In many cases, their features are drawn and their skin pallid. They may even have minor deformities, or a strangeness to their speech, gait, or general appearance that sets them apart from others.

traits.locale_text: Leerengeborene sind Menschen, die im Bauch eines Raumschiffs oder an Bord eines uralten Orbital-Satelliten geboren wurden. Diejenigen, die ihr Leben auf Raumschiffen verbracht haben, sind durch den realitätsverändernden Prozess der Warpreise und das Leben in niedriger oder gar keiner Schwerkraft bis zu einem gewissen Grad abgestumpft. In vielen Fällen sind ihre Gesichtszüge gezeichnet und ihre Haut ist blass. Sie können sogar kleine Missbildungen haben oder eine seltsame Sprache, einen seltsamen Gang oder ein ungewöhnliches Aussehen haben, das sie von anderen unterscheidet.

languages.text: Les hors-monde sont des êtres humains nés dans les entrailles d'un vaisseau spatial ou à bord d'une antique station orbitale. Ceux qui ont toujours vécu dans l'espace s'habituent jusqu'à un certain point au processus d'altération de la réalité inhérent aux voyages dans le Warp et à la vie dans des environnements à gravité faible ou nulle. Ils ont généralement les traits tirés et la peau pâle. Ils peuvent même présenter des difformités minimes, ou se distinguer par une élocution, une démarche ou une allure singulière.
languages.original_text: Voidborn are humans birthed in the belly of a void vessel or aboard an ancient orbital satellite. Those who have lived their lives on voidships become inured to some extent due to the reality-altering process of warp travel and to living in low- or zero-gravity environments. In many cases, their features are drawn and their skin pallid. They may even have minor deformities, or a strangeness to their speech, gait, or general appearance that sets them apart from others.

traits.locale_text: Les hors-monde sont des êtres humains nés dans les entrailles d'un vaisseau spatial ou à bord d'une antique station orbitale. Ceux qui ont toujours vécu dans l'espace s'habituent jusqu'à un certain point au processus d'altération de la réalité inhérent aux voyages dans le Warp et à la vie dans des environnements à gravité faible ou nulle. Ils ont généralement les traits tirés et la peau pâle. Ils peuvent même présenter des difformités minimes, ou se distinguer par une élocution, une démarche ou une allure singulière.

languages.text: 虚空之子诞生于虚空舰或古老的轨道卫星上。这些生活在虚空舰上的人已经适应了低重力或无重力的环境。由于不断穿越亚空间，他们的外部特征与普通人类已经变得有些不同。很多时候，他们的五官都显得很呆板，皮肤也很苍白。这些人甚至可能会有轻微的畸形，言语、步态与整体外观也可能与普通人类截然不同。
languages.original_text: Voidborn are humans birthed in the belly of a void vessel or aboard an ancient orbital satellite. Those who have lived their lives on voidships become inured to some extent due to the reality-altering process of warp travel and to living in low- or zero-gravity environments. In many cases, their features are drawn and their skin pallid. They may even have minor deformities, or a strangeness to their speech, gait, or general appearance that sets them apart from others.

traits.locale_text: 虚空之子诞生于虚空舰或古老的轨道卫星上。这些生活在虚空舰上的人已经适应了低重力或无重力的环境。由于不断穿越亚空间，他们的外部特征与普通人类已经变得有些不同。很多时候，他们的五官都显得很呆板，皮肤也很苍白。这些人甚至可能会有轻微的畸形，言语、步态与整体外观也可能与普通人类截然不同。

languages.text: Los nacidos en el vacío son aquellos humanos que nacen en la bodega de una nave del vacío o en un antiguo satélite orbital. Quienes viven toda su existencia en una nave del vacío acaban acostumbrándose hasta cierto punto a las alteraciones de la realidad que causa el viajar por la disformidad y a la gravedad baja o nula. En general, sus rostros son delgados y sus pieles pálidas. Es posible que tengan deformidades menores o que haya algo distinto en su forma de hablar, andar o ser que los diferencia de los demás.
languages.original_text: Voidborn are humans birthed in the belly of a void vessel or aboard an ancient orbital satellite. Those who have lived their lives on voidships become inured to some extent due to the reality-altering process of warp travel and to living in low- or zero-gravity environments. In many cases, their features are drawn and their skin pallid. They may even have minor deformities, or a strangeness to their speech, gait, or general appearance that sets them apart from others.

traits.locale_text: Los nacidos en el vacío son aquellos humanos que nacen en la bodega de una nave del vacío o en un antiguo satélite orbital. Quienes viven toda su existencia en una nave del vacío acaban acostumbrándose hasta cierto punto a las alteraciones de la realidad que causa el viajar por la disformidad y a la gravedad baja o nula. En general, sus rostros son delgados y sus pieles pálidas. Es posible que tengan deformidades menores o que haya algo distinto en su forma de hablar, andar o ser que los diferencia de los demás.

languages.text: 虚空生まれとは、ヴォイドシップの船内や古代の軌道衛星内で生まれた人間を指す。ヴォイドシップで生活してきた人たちは、ワープ航行という現実を変えるプロセスや、低重力または無重力環境での生活によって、その環境に一定度慣れてしまう。多くの場合、顔色は悪く、肌は青白い。多少の変形があったり、話し方や歩き方、容貌が他者と異なっていることも多い。
languages.original_text: Voidborn are humans birthed in the belly of a void vessel or aboard an ancient orbital satellite. Those who have lived their lives on voidships become inured to some extent due to the reality-altering process of warp travel and to living in low- or zero-gravity environments. In many cases, their features are drawn and their skin pallid. They may even have minor deformities, or a strangeness to their speech, gait, or general appearance that sets them apart from others.

languages.text: Uçsuzdoğanlar, bir uçsuz gemisinin bağrında ya da kadim bir yörünge uydusunda doğmuş insanlardır. Hayatları uçsuz gemisinde geçenler, öteboyut yolculuğunun gerçekliği eğip büküşüne ve düşük veya sıfır yerçekimli ortamlarda yaşamaya bir dereceye kadar alışkın hâle gelirler. Genellikle keskin yüz hatlarına ve solgun tene sahiptirler. Hatta onları diğerlerinden ayıran ufak tefek biçim bozuklukları veya konuşma, yürüme ya da genel görünümlerinde tuhaflıklar barındırabilirler.
languages.original_text: Voidborn are humans birthed in the belly of a void vessel or aboard an ancient orbital satellite. Those who have lived their lives on voidships become inured to some extent due to the reality-altering process of warp travel and to living in low- or zero-gravity environments. In many cases, their features are drawn and their skin pallid. They may even have minor deformities, or a strangeness to their speech, gait, or general appearance that sets them apart from others.
